query:
UPDATE island_guides SET 
  overview = CASE 
    WHEN slug = 'male-city' THEN 'Male is the vibrant capital of the Maldives, a bustling hub of culture, commerce, and history. This densely populated island offers a stark contrast to the serene resort islands, showcasing the authentic local lifestyle. With colorful buildings, busy markets, historic mosques, and excellent restaurants, Male provides an immersive cultural experience. The city serves as the main gateway for international travelers and is home to Ibrahim Nasir International Airport, making it the perfect starting point for any Maldives adventure.'
    WHEN slug = 'maafushi-island' THEN 'Maafushi Island is a local island paradise that offers an authentic Maldivian experience without the resort price tag. Located in the South Male Atoll, this island is known for its pristine beaches, excellent snorkeling opportunities, and warm hospitality. The island has developed into a popular budget-friendly destination with guesthouses, restaurants, and water sports facilities. Visitors can experience the genuine local culture, enjoy fresh seafood, and explore vibrant coral reefs teeming with tropical fish. The island''s laid-back atmosphere makes it perfect for travelers seeking an off-the-beaten-path adventure.'
    WHEN slug = 'thulusdhoo-island' THEN 'Thulusdhoo Island is the surfing capital of the Maldives, attracting water sports enthusiasts from around the world. Located in the North Male Atoll, this island is famous for its consistent waves, particularly during the monsoon season from March to October. Beyond surfing, Thulusdhoo offers beautiful beaches, excellent diving and snorkeling, and a thriving local community. The island has a vibrant nightlife scene with beach bars and restaurants, making it an ideal destination for adventure seekers and those looking to experience the Maldives beyond traditional resort life.'
    WHEN slug = 'banana-reef' THEN 'Banana Reef is a world-renowned diving destination famous for its spectacular coral formations and abundant marine life. Located in the North Male Atoll, this reef is named after its distinctive banana-shaped structure and is a must-visit for diving enthusiasts. The site features pristine coral gardens, colorful fish species, and occasional encounters with larger marine creatures like sharks and rays. With depths ranging from 5 to 30 meters, Banana Reef offers diving opportunities for both beginners and experienced divers. The reef''s exceptional biodiversity and stunning underwater landscape make it one of the Maldives'' most iconic diving spots.'
    WHEN slug = 'dhigurah-island' THEN 'Dhigurah Island is a picturesque local island famous for its whale shark season and family-friendly atmosphere. Located in the South Male Atoll, this island offers a perfect blend of adventure and relaxation. From June to October, the island becomes a hotspot for whale shark encounters, attracting marine enthusiasts worldwide. Beyond whale sharks, Dhigurah features beautiful sandy beaches, excellent snorkeling and diving opportunities, and a welcoming local community. The island''s guesthouses and restaurants provide authentic Maldivian hospitality, making it an ideal destination for families and budget-conscious travelers.'
    WHEN slug = 'ukulhas-island' THEN 'Ukulhas Island is a charming local island that offers an authentic glimpse into Maldivian culture and traditions. Located in the South Male Atoll, this island is known for its friendly locals, traditional fishing practices, and excellent diving opportunities. The island features beautiful coral reefs, a vibrant fish market, and local restaurants serving fresh seafood. Visitors can experience genuine Maldivian life, explore traditional crafts, and enjoy warm hospitality. The island''s peaceful atmosphere and cultural richness make it perfect for travelers seeking meaningful connections and authentic experiences.'
    WHEN slug = 'veligandu-island' THEN 'Veligandu Island is a luxury resort destination offering world-class accommodations and pristine natural beauty. Located in the North Male Atoll, this island is renowned for its overwater bungalows, crystal-clear lagoons, and exceptional service. The island features pristine beaches, excellent water sports facilities, and a variety of dining options. Veligandu is perfect for honeymooners, couples seeking romance, and luxury travelers. The island''s exclusive atmosphere, combined with stunning natural surroundings and top-notch amenities, makes it an unforgettable destination for those seeking the ultimate tropical paradise experience.'
    WHEN slug = 'kandooma-island' THEN 'Kandooma Island is a premier diving destination offering exceptional underwater experiences and luxury resort facilities. Located in the South Male Atoll, this island is famous for its vibrant coral reefs, abundant marine life, and professional diving centers. The island features multiple dive sites within close proximity, making it ideal for diving enthusiasts of all levels. Beyond diving, Kandooma offers beautiful beaches, water sports, and excellent dining. The island''s combination of world-class diving opportunities and resort amenities makes it perfect for divers seeking comfort and adventure.'
    WHEN slug = 'fulidhoo-island' THEN 'Fulidhoo Island is a traditional fishing village that offers an immersive cultural experience and authentic local hospitality. Located in the Vaavu Atoll, this island is known for its vibrant fishing traditions, local markets, and genuine Maldivian lifestyle. Visitors can experience traditional fishing methods, visit the local fish market, and enjoy fresh seafood at family-run restaurants. The island features beautiful beaches, excellent snorkeling, and opportunities to interact with friendly locals. Fulidhoo is perfect for travelers seeking cultural immersion and authentic experiences away from tourist crowds.'
    WHEN slug = 'haa-alifu-atoll' THEN 'Haa Alifu Atoll is a remote and exclusive destination offering pristine natural beauty and ultimate privacy. Located in the far north of the Maldives, this atoll is known for its untouched beaches, pristine coral reefs, and exclusive luxury resorts. The atoll features world-class diving and snorkeling, abundant marine life, and a peaceful atmosphere. With limited development and few tourists, Haa Alifu offers a truly exclusive experience. The atoll is perfect for travelers seeking solitude, luxury, and unspoiled natural beauty in a remote tropical paradise.'
  END,
  description = CASE 
    WHEN slug = 'male-city' THEN 'Experience the vibrant capital city with historic mosques, colorful markets, and authentic local culture. Explore the Friday Mosque, visit the National Museum, shop at local markets, and enjoy fresh seafood at waterfront restaurants. Male offers a unique urban experience in the tropical Maldives.'
    WHEN slug = 'maafushi-island' THEN 'Discover budget-friendly island paradise with pristine beaches and excellent snorkeling. Experience authentic local culture, enjoy fresh seafood, and explore vibrant coral reefs. Perfect for travelers seeking genuine Maldivian experiences without resort prices.'
    WHEN slug = 'thulusdhoo-island' THEN 'The surfing capital of the Maldives with consistent waves and vibrant beach culture. Enjoy water sports, diving, snorkeling, and local nightlife. Ideal for adventure seekers and those seeking authentic island experiences.'
    WHEN slug = 'banana-reef' THEN 'World-renowned diving destination with spectacular coral formations and abundant marine life. Experience pristine coral gardens, colorful fish species, and occasional encounters with sharks and rays. A must-visit for diving enthusiasts.'
    WHEN slug = 'dhigurah-island' THEN 'Family-friendly island famous for whale shark encounters during season (June-October). Enjoy beautiful beaches, excellent snorkeling and diving, and authentic local hospitality. Perfect for families and adventure seekers.'
    WHEN slug = 'ukulhas-island' THEN 'Authentic local island offering genuine cultural experiences and excellent diving. Explore traditional fishing practices, visit vibrant fish markets, and enjoy fresh seafood. Perfect for cultural immersion.'
    WHEN slug = 'veligandu-island' THEN 'Luxury resort destination with overwater bungalows and crystal-clear lagoons. Experience world-class service, pristine beaches, and exceptional dining. Ideal for honeymooners and luxury travelers.'
    WHEN slug = 'kandooma-island' THEN 'Premier diving destination with vibrant coral reefs and professional diving centers. Multiple dive sites within close proximity. Perfect for diving enthusiasts seeking comfort and adventure.'
    WHEN slug = 'fulidhoo-island' THEN 'Traditional fishing village offering immersive cultural experiences and authentic hospitality. Experience traditional fishing methods, visit local markets, and enjoy fresh seafood. Perfect for cultural immersion.'
    WHEN slug = 'haa-alifu-atoll' THEN 'Remote and exclusive destination with pristine natural beauty and ultimate privacy. World-class diving and snorkeling in untouched coral reefs. Perfect for luxury travelers seeking solitude and exclusivity.'
  END,
  bestSeason = CASE 
    WHEN slug = 'male-city' THEN 'November to April'
    WHEN slug = 'maafushi-island' THEN 'November to April'
    WHEN slug = 'thulusdhoo-island' THEN 'March to October (Surfing), November to April (General)'
    WHEN slug = 'banana-reef' THEN 'November to April'
    WHEN slug = 'dhigurah-island' THEN 'June to October (Whale Sharks), November to April (General)'
    WHEN slug = 'ukulhas-island' THEN 'November to April'
    WHEN slug = 'veligandu-island' THEN 'November to April'
    WHEN slug = 'kandooma-island' THEN 'November to April'
    WHEN slug = 'fulidhoo-island' THEN 'November to April'
    WHEN slug = 'haa-alifu-atoll' THEN 'November to April'
  END,
  activities = CASE 
    WHEN slug = 'male-city' THEN 'Mosque visits, Market exploration, Museum tours, Local cuisine tasting, Photography, Shopping, Water sports'
    WHEN slug = 'maafushi-island' THEN 'Snorkeling, Diving, Beach relaxation, Local market visits, Sunset watching, Island hopping, Local cuisine'
    WHEN slug = 'thulusdhoo-island' THEN 'Surfing, Diving, Snorkeling, Beach volleyball, Nightlife, Water sports, Local exploration'
    WHEN slug = 'banana-reef' THEN 'Diving, Snorkeling, Photography, Marine life observation, Wreck diving, Night diving'
    WHEN slug = 'dhigurah-island' THEN 'Whale shark watching, Snorkeling, Diving, Beach relaxation, Local market visits, Sunset watching'
    WHEN slug = 'ukulhas-island' THEN 'Diving, Snorkeling, Local market visits, Fishing experiences, Photography, Cultural exploration'
    WHEN slug = 'veligandu-island' THEN 'Spa treatments, Water sports, Diving, Snorkeling, Sunset watching, Fine dining, Beach relaxation'
    WHEN slug = 'kandooma-island' THEN 'Diving, Snorkeling, Water sports, Spa treatments, Beach relaxation, Fine dining'
    WHEN slug = 'fulidhoo-island' THEN 'Fishing experiences, Local market visits, Snorkeling, Diving, Cultural exploration, Photography'
    WHEN slug = 'haa-alifu-atoll' THEN 'Diving, Snorkeling, Luxury spa, Fine dining, Beach relaxation, Marine life observation'
  END,
  dining = CASE 
    WHEN slug = 'male-city' THEN 'Seafood restaurants at the harbor, Local curry houses, International cuisine, Cafes, Street food vendors, Fine dining establishments'
    WHEN slug = 'maafushi-island' THEN 'Local guesthouses with home-cooked meals, Fresh seafood restaurants, Casual beach cafes, Local curry houses'
    WHEN slug = 'thulusdhoo-island' THEN 'Beach bars and restaurants, Local curry houses, Fresh seafood, International cuisine, Casual dining'
    WHEN slug = 'banana-reef' THEN 'Resort restaurants, Dive center cafes, Local island dining options'
    WHEN slug = 'dhigurah-island' THEN 'Guesthouse restaurants, Fresh seafood, Local curry houses, Beach cafes, Family-run restaurants'
    WHEN slug = 'ukulhas-island' THEN 'Local family restaurants, Fresh fish market, Traditional Maldivian cuisine, Casual dining'
    WHEN slug = 'veligandu-island' THEN 'Multiple fine dining restaurants, International cuisine, Seafood specialties, Beach bars, Spa cuisine'
    WHEN slug = 'kandooma-island' THEN 'Resort restaurants, International cuisine, Seafood specialties, Spa cuisine, Beach bars'
    WHEN slug = 'fulidhoo-island' THEN 'Family-run restaurants, Fresh seafood, Traditional Maldivian cuisine, Local market food'
    WHEN slug = 'haa-alifu-atoll' THEN 'Luxury resort restaurants, Fine dining, International cuisine, Seafood specialties'
  END,
  packingTips = CASE 
    WHEN slug = 'male-city' THEN 'Light summer clothing, Comfortable walking shoes, Sun protection (sunscreen, hat, sunglasses), Light rain jacket, Modest clothing for mosque visits, Swimwear, Casual evening wear for restaurants'
    WHEN slug = 'maafushi-island' THEN 'Light summer clothing, Swimwear, Snorkeling gear, Reef shoes, Sun protection, Light rain jacket, Casual evening wear, Waterproof bag'
    WHEN slug = 'thulusdhoo-island' THEN 'Light summer clothing, Swimwear, Surfboard or rental, Reef shoes, Sun protection, Light rain jacket, Casual evening wear, Waterproof bag'
    WHEN slug = 'banana-reef' THEN 'Diving certification card, Swimwear, Reef shoes, Sun protection, Light rain jacket, Casual evening wear, Waterproof bag, Diving log book'
    WHEN slug = 'dhigurah-island' THEN 'Light summer clothing, Swimwear, Snorkeling gear, Reef shoes, Sun protection, Light rain jacket, Casual evening wear, Waterproof bag'
    WHEN slug = 'ukulhas-island' THEN 'Light summer clothing, Swimwear, Snorkeling gear, Reef shoes, Sun protection, Light rain jacket, Casual evening wear, Waterproof bag'
    WHEN slug = 'veligandu-island' THEN 'Light summer clothing, Swimwear, Elegant casual wear, Sun protection, Light rain jacket, Formal evening wear, Reef shoes, Waterproof bag'
    WHEN slug = 'kandooma-island' THEN 'Diving certification card, Swimwear, Reef shoes, Sun protection, Light rain jacket, Casual evening wear, Waterproof bag, Diving log book'
    WHEN slug = 'fulidhoo-island' THEN 'Light summer clothing, Swimwear, Snorkeling gear, Reef shoes, Sun protection, Light rain jacket, Casual evening wear, Waterproof bag'
    WHEN slug = 'haa-alifu-atoll' THEN 'Light summer clothing, Swimwear, Elegant casual wear, Sun protection, Light rain jacket, Formal evening wear, Reef shoes, Waterproof bag'
  END,
  healthSafety = CASE 
    WHEN slug = 'male-city' THEN 'Good medical facilities available. Tap water is generally safe. Vaccinations recommended. Travel insurance advised. Be aware of traffic. Respect local customs and dress codes.'
    WHEN slug = 'maafushi-island' THEN 'Basic medical facilities available. Drink bottled water. Travel insurance recommended. Sun protection essential. Respect local customs. Be cautious with water activities.'
    WHEN slug = 'thulusdhoo-island' THEN 'Medical facilities available. Drink bottled water. Travel insurance recommended. Sun protection essential. Be cautious with water activities. Respect local customs.'
    WHEN slug = 'banana-reef' THEN 'Ensure diving certification. Travel insurance essential. Decompression chambers available. Sun protection critical. Follow diving safety guidelines. Respect marine life.'
    WHEN slug = 'dhigurah-island' THEN 'Basic medical facilities available. Drink bottled water. Travel insurance recommended. Sun protection essential. Be cautious with water activities. Respect marine life.'
    WHEN slug = 'ukulhas-island' THEN 'Basic medical facilities available. Drink bottled water. Travel insurance recommended. Sun protection essential. Be cautious with water activities. Respect local customs.'
    WHEN slug = 'veligandu-island' THEN 'Excellent medical facilities. Drink bottled water. Travel insurance recommended. Sun protection essential. Resort security provided. Respect marine life.'
    WHEN slug = 'kandooma-island' THEN 'Good medical facilities. Decompression chambers available. Travel insurance essential. Sun protection critical. Follow diving safety guidelines. Respect marine life.'
    WHEN slug = 'fulidhoo-island' THEN 'Basic medical facilities available. Drink bottled water. Travel insurance recommended. Sun protection essential. Be cautious with water activities. Respect local customs.'
    WHEN slug = 'haa-alifu-atoll' THEN 'Excellent medical facilities. Helicopter evacuation available. Travel insurance essential. Sun protection critical. Resort security provided. Respect marine life.'
  END,
  faqContent = CASE 
    WHEN slug = 'male-city' THEN 'Q: What is the best time to visit Male? A: November to April offers the best weather. Q: How do I get around Male? A: Taxis, buses, and ferries are available. Q: Is Male safe for tourists? A: Yes, generally safe but use common sense. Q: What are the main attractions? A: Friday Mosque, National Museum, local markets, and waterfront areas.'
    WHEN slug = 'maafushi-island' THEN 'Q: How do I get to Maafushi? A: Speedboat from Male (45 minutes). Q: Is snorkeling safe? A: Yes, with proper precautions. Q: What is the cost? A: Budget-friendly compared to resorts. Q: Can I see marine life? A: Yes, excellent snorkeling opportunities.'
    WHEN slug = 'thulusdhoo-island' THEN 'Q: When is the best surfing season? A: March to October. Q: Do I need experience? A: Lessons available for beginners. Q: How do I get there? A: Speedboat from Male. Q: What else can I do? A: Diving, snorkeling, and nightlife.'
    WHEN slug = 'banana-reef' THEN 'Q: What diving level is required? A: Open Water certification minimum. Q: What marine life can I see? A: Fish, rays, sharks, and coral. Q: How deep do we dive? A: 5-30 meters. Q: Is it safe? A: Yes, with proper training and guides.'
    WHEN slug = 'dhigurah-island' THEN 'Q: When can I see whale sharks? A: June to October. Q: Is it guaranteed? A: High probability but not guaranteed. Q: How do I get there? A: Speedboat from Male. Q: What else is there to do? A: Snorkeling, diving, and beach relaxation.'
    WHEN slug = 'ukulhas-island' THEN 'Q: How do I get to Ukulhas? A: Speedboat from Male. Q: What is the local culture like? A: Fishing-based with warm hospitality. Q: Is diving available? A: Yes, excellent diving sites. Q: What should I expect? A: Authentic local experience.'
    WHEN slug = 'veligandu-island' THEN 'Q: What is the accommodation like? A: Luxury overwater bungalows. Q: What activities are available? A: Water sports, diving, spa, fine dining. Q: Is it suitable for families? A: Yes, excellent family facilities. Q: What is the price range? A: Luxury pricing.'
    WHEN slug = 'kandooma-island' THEN 'Q: What diving sites are nearby? A: Multiple world-class sites. Q: Is it suitable for beginners? A: Yes, with proper training. Q: What accommodation is available? A: Resort bungalows. Q: What other activities? A: Snorkeling, water sports, spa.'
    WHEN slug = 'fulidhoo-island' THEN 'Q: How do I experience local culture? A: Visit markets, join fishing trips. Q: Is it safe? A: Yes, very welcoming community. Q: What is the accommodation? A: Guesthouses with local families. Q: How do I get there? A: Speedboat from Male.'
    WHEN slug = 'haa-alifu-atoll' THEN 'Q: How remote is it? A: Very remote, limited development. Q: How do I get there? A: Seaplane from Male. Q: What is the cost? A: Premium luxury pricing. Q: Is it worth the journey? A: Yes, pristine and exclusive.'
  END,
  itinerary = CASE 
    WHEN slug = 'male-city' THEN 'Day 1: Arrive at airport, explore Male city, visit Friday Mosque, enjoy local dinner. Day 2: Visit National Museum, explore local markets, shop for souvenirs, sunset at waterfront. Day 3: Take boat trip to nearby islands, snorkel, return to Male for departure.'
    WHEN slug = 'maafushi-island' THEN 'Day 1: Arrive at island, settle in guesthouse, relax on beach. Day 2: Snorkeling trip, explore coral reefs, fresh seafood dinner. Day 3: Island exploration, local market visit, water sports, sunset watching.'
    WHEN slug = 'thulusdhoo-island' THEN 'Day 1: Arrive at island, settle in, explore beach. Day 2: Surfing lessons or diving, beach activities. Day 3: Water sports, snorkeling, nightlife, local exploration.'
    WHEN slug = 'banana-reef' THEN 'Day 1: Arrive, diving certification or check-in. Day 2: Multiple dives at Banana Reef, marine life observation. Day 3: Advanced dives, photography, relaxation.'
    WHEN slug = 'dhigurah-island' THEN 'Day 1: Arrive at island, settle in, relax on beach. Day 2: Whale shark watching (seasonal), snorkeling. Day 3: Diving, island exploration, local market visit.'
    WHEN slug = 'ukulhas-island' THEN 'Day 1: Arrive at island, explore local community. Day 2: Diving, snorkeling, local market visit. Day 3: Cultural exploration, fishing experience, local cuisine.'
    WHEN slug = 'veligandu-island' THEN 'Day 1: Arrive at resort, settle in luxury bungalow. Day 2: Water sports, spa treatment, fine dining. Day 3: Diving, snorkeling, beach relaxation, sunset dinner.'
    WHEN slug = 'kandooma-island' THEN 'Day 1: Arrive at resort, diving briefing. Day 2: Multiple dives at nearby sites, marine life observation. Day 3: Advanced dives, snorkeling, spa treatment.'
    WHEN slug = 'fulidhoo-island' THEN 'Day 1: Arrive at island, meet local family, explore village. Day 2: Fishing experience, market visit, snorkeling. Day 3: Cultural immersion, diving, local cuisine.'
    WHEN slug = 'haa-alifu-atoll' THEN 'Day 1: Arrive by seaplane, settle in luxury resort. Day 2: Pristine diving and snorkeling, marine life observation. Day 3: Relaxation, spa, fine dining, exclusive experiences.'
  END
WHERE slug IN ('male-city', 'maafushi-island', 'thulusdhoo-island', 'banana-reef', 'dhigurah-island', 'ukulhas-island', 'veligandu-island', 'kandooma-island', 'fulidhoo-island', 'haa-alifu-atoll')
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway03.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 3FFv3TtDUeNbYDM.root --database JUCCYykxYWxAcNny3wop55 --execute UPDATE island_guides SET 
  overview = CASE 
    WHEN slug = 'male-city' THEN 'Male is the vibrant capital of the Maldives, a bustling hub of culture, commerce, and history. This densely populated island offers a stark contrast to the serene resort islands, showcasing the authentic local lifestyle. With colorful buildings, busy markets, historic mosques, and excellent restaurants, Male provides an immersive cultural experience. The city serves as the main gateway for international travelers and is home to Ibrahim Nasir International Airport, making it the perfect starting point for any Maldives adventure.'
    WHEN slug = 'maafushi-island' THEN 'Maafushi Island is a local island paradise that offers an authentic Maldivian experience without the resort price tag. Located in the South Male Atoll, this island is known for its pristine beaches, excellent snorkeling opportunities, and warm hospitality. The island has developed into a popular budget-friendly destination with guesthouses, restaurants, and water sports facilities. Visitors can experience the genuine local culture, enjoy fresh seafood, and explore vibrant coral reefs teeming with tropical fish. The island''s laid-back atmosphere makes it perfect for travelers seeking an off-the-beaten-path adventure.'
    WHEN slug = 'thulusdhoo-island' THEN 'Thulusdhoo Island is the surfing capital of the Maldives, attracting water sports enthusiasts from around the world. Located in the North Male Atoll, this island is famous for its consistent waves, particularly during the monsoon season from March to October. Beyond surfing, Thulusdhoo offers beautiful beaches, excellent diving and snorkeling, and a thriving local community. The island has a vibrant nightlife scene with beach bars and restaurants, making it an ideal destination for adventure seekers and those looking to experience the Maldives beyond traditional resort life.'
    WHEN slug = 'banana-reef' THEN 'Banana Reef is a world-renowned diving destination famous for its spectacular coral formations and abundant marine life. Located in the North Male Atoll, this reef is named after its distinctive banana-shaped structure and is a must-visit for diving enthusiasts. The site features pristine coral gardens, colorful fish species, and occasional encounters with larger marine creatures like sharks and rays. With depths ranging from 5 to 30 meters, Banana Reef offers diving opportunities for both beginners and experienced divers. The reef''s exceptional biodiversity and stunning underwater landscape make it one of the Maldives'' most iconic diving spots.'
    WHEN slug = 'dhigurah-island' THEN 'Dhigurah Island is a picturesque local island famous for its whale shark season and family-friendly atmosphere. Located in the South Male Atoll, this island offers a perfect blend of adventure and relaxation. From June to October, the island becomes a hotspot for whale shark encounters, attracting marine enthusiasts worldwide. Beyond whale sharks, Dhigurah features beautiful sandy beaches, excellent snorkeling and diving opportunities, and a welcoming local community. The island''s guesthouses and restaurants provide authentic Maldivian hospitality, making it an ideal destination for families and budget-conscious travelers.'
    WHEN slug = 'ukulhas-island' THEN 'Ukulhas Island is a charming local island that offers an authentic glimpse into Maldivian culture and traditions. Located in the South Male Atoll, this island is known for its friendly locals, traditional fishing practices, and excellent diving opportunities. The island features beautiful coral reefs, a vibrant fish market, and local restaurants serving fresh seafood. Visitors can experience genuine Maldivian life, explore traditional crafts, and enjoy warm hospitality. The island''s peaceful atmosphere and cultural richness make it perfect for travelers seeking meaningful connections and authentic experiences.'
    WHEN slug = 'veligandu-island' THEN 'Veligandu Island is a luxury resort destination offering world-class accommodations and pristine natural beauty. Located in the North Male Atoll, this island is renowned for its overwater bungalows, crystal-clear lagoons, and exceptional service. The island features pristine beaches, excellent water sports facilities, and a variety of dining options. Veligandu is perfect for honeymooners, couples seeking romance, and luxury travelers. The island''s exclusive atmosphere, combined with stunning natural surroundings and top-notch amenities, makes it an unforgettable destination for those seeking the ultimate tropical paradise experience.'
    WHEN slug = 'kandooma-island' THEN 'Kandooma Island is a premier diving destination offering exceptional underwater experiences and luxury resort facilities. Located in the South Male Atoll, this island is famous for its vibrant coral reefs, abundant marine life, and professional diving centers. The island features multiple dive sites within close proximity, making it ideal for diving enthusiasts of all levels. Beyond diving, Kandooma offers beautiful beaches, water sports, and excellent dining. The island''s combination of world-class diving opportunities and resort amenities makes it perfect for divers seeking comfort and adventure.'
    WHEN slug = 'fulidhoo-island' THEN 'Fulidhoo Island is a traditional fishing village that offers an immersive cultural experience and authentic local hospitality. Located in the Vaavu Atoll, this island is known for its vibrant fishing traditions, local markets, and genuine Maldivian lifestyle. Visitors can experience traditional fishing methods, visit the local fish market, and enjoy fresh seafood at family-run restaurants. The island features beautiful beaches, excellent snorkeling, and opportunities to interact with friendly locals. Fulidhoo is perfect for travelers seeking cultural immersion and authentic experiences away from tourist crowds.'
    WHEN slug = 'haa-alifu-atoll' THEN 'Haa Alifu Atoll is a remote and exclusive destination offering pristine natural beauty and ultimate privacy. Located in the far north of the Maldives, this atoll is known for its untouched beaches, pristine coral reefs, and exclusive luxury resorts. The atoll features world-class diving and snorkeling, abundant marine life, and a peaceful atmosphere. With limited development and few tourists, Haa Alifu offers a truly exclusive experience. The atoll is perfect for travelers seeking solitude, luxury, and unspoiled natural beauty in a remote tropical paradise.'
  END,
  description = CASE 
    WHEN slug = 'male-city' THEN 'Experience the vibrant capital city with historic mosques, colorful markets, and authentic local culture. Explore the Friday Mosque, visit the National Museum, shop at local markets, and enjoy fresh seafood at waterfront restaurants. Male offers a unique urban experience in the tropical Maldives.'
    WHEN slug = 'maafushi-island' THEN 'Discover budget-friendly island paradise with pristine beaches and excellent snorkeling. Experience authentic local culture, enjoy fresh seafood, and explore vibrant coral reefs. Perfect for travelers seeking genuine Maldivian experiences without resort prices.'
    WHEN slug = 'thulusdhoo-island' THEN 'The surfing capital of the Maldives with consistent waves and vibrant beach culture. Enjoy water sports, diving, snorkeling, and local nightlife. Ideal for adventure seekers and those seeking authentic island experiences.'
    WHEN slug = 'banana-reef' THEN 'World-renowned diving destination with spectacular coral formations and abundant marine life. Experience pristine coral gardens, colorful fish species, and occasional encounters with sharks and rays. A must-visit for diving enthusiasts.'
    WHEN slug = 'dhigurah-island' THEN 'Family-friendly island famous for whale shark encounters during season (June-October). Enjoy beautiful beaches, excellent snorkeling and diving, and authentic local hospitality. Perfect for families and adventure seekers.'
    WHEN slug = 'ukulhas-island' THEN 'Authentic local island offering genuine cultural experiences and excellent diving. Explore traditional fishing practices, visit vibrant fish markets, and enjoy fresh seafood. Perfect for cultural immersion.'
    WHEN slug = 'veligandu-island' THEN 'Luxury resort destination with overwater bungalows and crystal-clear lagoons. Experience world-class service, pristine beaches, and exceptional dining. Ideal for honeymooners and luxury travelers.'
    WHEN slug = 'kandooma-island' THEN 'Premier diving destination with vibrant coral reefs and professional diving centers. Multiple dive sites within close proximity. Perfect for diving enthusiasts seeking comfort and adventure.'
    WHEN slug = 'fulidhoo-island' THEN 'Traditional fishing village offering immersive cultural experiences and authentic hospitality. Experience traditional fishing methods, visit local markets, and enjoy fresh seafood. Perfect for cultural immersion.'
    WHEN slug = 'haa-alifu-atoll' THEN 'Remote and exclusive destination with pristine natural beauty and ultimate privacy. World-class diving and snorkeling in untouched coral reefs. Perfect for luxury travelers seeking solitude and exclusivity.'
  END,
  bestSeason = CASE 
    WHEN slug = 'male-city' THEN 'November to April'
    WHEN slug = 'maafushi-island' THEN 'November to April'
    WHEN slug = 'thulusdhoo-island' THEN 'March to October (Surfing), November to April (General)'
    WHEN slug = 'banana-reef' THEN 'November to April'
    WHEN slug = 'dhigurah-island' THEN 'June to October (Whale Sharks), November to April (General)'
    WHEN slug = 'ukulhas-island' THEN 'November to April'
    WHEN slug = 'veligandu-island' THEN 'November to April'
    WHEN slug = 'kandooma-island' THEN 'November to April'
    WHEN slug = 'fulidhoo-island' THEN 'November to April'
    WHEN slug = 'haa-alifu-atoll' THEN 'November to April'
  END,
  activities = CASE 
    WHEN slug = 'male-city' THEN 'Mosque visits, Market exploration, Museum tours, Local cuisine tasting, Photography, Shopping, Water sports'
    WHEN slug = 'maafushi-island' THEN 'Snorkeling, Diving, Beach relaxation, Local market visits, Sunset watching, Island hopping, Local cuisine'
    WHEN slug = 'thulusdhoo-island' THEN 'Surfing, Diving, Snorkeling, Beach volleyball, Nightlife, Water sports, Local exploration'
    WHEN slug = 'banana-reef' THEN 'Diving, Snorkeling, Photography, Marine life observation, Wreck diving, Night diving'
    WHEN slug = 'dhigurah-island' THEN 'Whale shark watching, Snorkeling, Diving, Beach relaxation, Local market visits, Sunset watching'

  faqContent = CASE 
    WHEN slug = 'male-city' THEN 'Q: What is the best time to visit Male? A: November to April offers the best weather. Q: How do I get around Male? A: Taxis, buses, and ferries are available. Q: Is Male safe for tourists? A: Yes, generally safe but use common sense. Q: What are the main attractions? A: Friday Mosque, National Museum, local markets, and waterfront areas.'
    WHEN slug = 'maafushi-island' THEN 'Q: How do I get to Maafushi? A: Speedboat from Male (45 minutes). Q: Is snorkeling safe? A: Yes, with proper precautions. Q: What is the cost? A: Budget-friendly compared to resorts. Q: Can I see marine life? A: Yes, excellent snorkeling opportunities.'
    WHEN slug = 'thulusdhoo-island' THEN 'Q: When is the best surfing season? A: March to October. Q: Do I need experience? A: Lessons available for beginners. Q: How do I get there? A: Speedboat from Male. Q: What else can I do? A: Diving, snorkeling, and nightlife.'
    WHEN slug = 'banana-reef' THEN 'Q: What diving level is required? A: Open Water certification minimum. Q: What marine life can I see? A: Fish, rays, sharks, and coral. Q: How deep do we dive? A: 5-30 meters. Q: Is it safe? A: Yes, with proper training and guides.'
    WHEN slug = 'dhigurah-island' THEN 'Q: When can I see whale sharks? A: June to October. Q: Is it guaranteed? A: High probability but not guaranteed. Q: How do I get there? A: Speedboat from Male. Q: What else is there to do? A: Snorkeling, diving, and beach relaxation.'
    WHEN slug = 'ukulhas-island' THEN 'Q: How do I get to Ukulhas? A: Speedboat from Male. Q: What is the local culture like? A: Fishing-based with warm hospitality. Q: Is diving available? A: Yes, excellent diving sites. Q: What should I expect? A: Authentic local experience.'
    WHEN slug = 'veligandu-island' THEN 'Q: What is the accommodation like? A: Luxury overwater bungalows. Q: What activities are available? A: Water sports, diving, spa, fine dining. Q: Is it suitable for families? A: Yes, excellent family facilities. Q: What is the price range? A: Luxury pricing.'
    WHEN slug = 'kandooma-island' THEN 'Q: What diving sites are nearby? A: Multiple world-class sites. Q: Is it suitable for beginners? A: Yes, with proper training. Q: What accommodation is available? A: Resort bungalows. Q: What other activities? A: Snorkeling, water sports, spa.'
    WHEN slug = 'fulidhoo-island' THEN 'Q: How do I experience local culture? A: Visit markets, join fishing trips. Q: Is it safe? A: Yes, very welcoming community. Q: What is the accommodation? A: Guesthouses with local families. Q: How do I get there? A: Speedboat from Male.'
    WHEN slug = 'haa-alifu-atoll' THEN 'Q: How remote is it? A: Very remote, limited development. Q: How do I get there? A: Seaplane from Male. Q: What is the cost? A: Premium luxury pricing. Q: Is it worth the journey? A: Yes, pristine and exclusive.'
  END,
  itinerary = CASE 
    WHEN slug = 'male-city' THEN 'Day 1: Arrive at airport, explore Male city, visit Friday Mosque, enjoy local dinner. Day 2: Visit National Museum, explore local markets, shop for souvenirs, sunset at waterfront. Day 3: Take boat trip to nearby islands, snorkel, return to Male for departure.'
    WHEN slug = 'maafushi-island' THEN 'Day 1: Arrive at island, settle in guesthouse, relax on beach. Day 2: Snorkeling trip, explore coral reefs, fresh seafood dinner. Day 3: Island exploration, local market visit, water sports, sunset watching.'
    WHEN slug = 'thulusdhoo-island' THEN 'Day 1: Arrive at island, settle in, explore beach. Day 2: Surfing lessons or diving, beach activities. Day 3: Water sports, snorkeling, nightlife, local exploration.'

    WHEN slug = 'dhigurah-island' THEN 'Day 1: Arrive at island, settle in, relax on beach. Day 2: Whale shark watching (seasonal), snorkeling. Day 3: Diving, island exploration, local market visit.'

    WHEN slug = 'kandooma-island' THEN 'Day 1: Arrive at resort, diving briefing. Day 2: Multiple dives at nearby sites, marine life observation. Day 3: Advanced dives, snorkeling, spa treatment.'
    WHEN slug = 'fulidhoo-island' THEN 'Day 1: Arrive at island, meet local family, explore village. Day 2: Fishing experience, market visit, snorkeling. Day 3: Cultural immersion, diving, local cuisine.'
    WHEN slug = 'haa-alifu-atoll' THEN 'Day 1: Arrive by seaplane, settle in luxury resort. Day 2: Pristine diving and snorkeling, marine life observation. Day 3: Relaxation, spa, fine dining, exclusive experiences.'
